Workshop: NodeGoat

Location:
Ekonomikum, F327, Uppsala University (or Zoom)

Lecturer:
Dann Wu

Date:
19 March 2026, 13:0016:00

Type:
Workshop

Nodegoat is a web-based research environment for humanities. Since 2023, a server is set up at Uppsala university. Together with the Nodegoat founders, InfraVis and CDHU offer a workshop that the participants may attend either on Zoom or at the venue.

At the workshop, the founders will introduce the environment and present successful use cases in humanities and social science research. Afterwards, participants will have an hands-on lab to practice in the environment. The lab is about the data modeling, as well as exploration and visualization.

Registration

Learn more aboutNodeGoat:https://nodegoat.net/
Organiser:InfraVis and CDHU

Contact person:Dann Wu

Human Timeline

InfraVis is a national research infrastructure funded by the Swedish Research Council (Vetenskapsrdet) in support of scientific advancement through the application of state-of-the-art data analysis and visualization techniques.
